mapper.select: SELECT Q.QUESTION_ID questionId, C.COURSE_NAME questionCourseName, Q.QUESTION_CONTENT questionContent, Q.QUESTION_SCORE questionScore, Q.QUESTION_TYPE questionType, U.USERNAME createUserName, Q.CREATE_TIME createTime FROM T_QUESTION Q LEFT JOIN T_COURSE C ON Q.QUESTION_COURSE_ID = C.COURSE_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON Q.CREATE_USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE Q.QUESTION_ID = #{questionId}
